name: Flybird Quest.
description:
A point and click adventure game.

Flybird, the goblin, has been tasked with stealing the TIME CRYSTAL for the boss. She is the only one willing to do it and the fate of the world fulls into her tiny hands. Her tiny, malicious intended hands. 

In this pre-adventure Flybrid finds herself just outside Crynos Castle and needs to get inside to claim her prize.

Left Mouse to commit to your action

Right mouse to pick cycle through your actions.
